articles.description: The British are taking a different approach to managing the coronavirus outbreak - or are they?
articles.content:
The British are taking a different approach to managing the coronavirus outbreak – or are they?

articles.title: Making sense of it all in a post-coronavirus world
articles.description: Any lengthy disruption to the fixture calendar as a result of the coronavirus will no doubt result in some difficult decisions for organisers, writes James McMahon.
articles.content:
We face a period of uncertainty in not knowing how long the coronavirus will impact daily living.

articles.title: The Coronas discuss the impact of the Coronavirus
articles.description: The Irish band, The Coronas, are questioning the choice of the name of their band, and how touring with such a name is proving challenging while the world is in the grip of the coronavirus.
articles.content:

articles.author: RTÉ News
articles.title: US extends travel ban to Ireland, UK over coronavirus
articles.description: Vice President Mike Pence has announced that a travel ban imposed on European nations over the coronavirus pandemic would be extended to Ireland and the United Kingdom.
articles.content:
Vice President Mike Pence has announced that a travel ban imposed on European nations over the coronavirus pandemic would be extended to Ireland and the United Kingdom.
The ban will come into effect at 4am (Irish time) on Tuesday.
